'''''Sagan om Ringen''''' (Swedish, "The Saga of the Rings", the title of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'') is a [[1972]] album by [[Bo Hansson]]. It was the first [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] themed album to be published, by [[wikipedia:Silence Records|Silence Records]]. It quickly gained popularity in the UK, and it was published there as '''Music Inspired by Lord of the Rings''' in October 1972. 

==Track listing==
# "Första Vandringen" ("Leaving the Shire")
# "Den Gimmla Skogen och Tom Bombadill" ("The Old Forest and Tom Bombadil")
# "I Skuggornas Rike" ("Fog On The Barrow-Downs")
# "De Svarta Ryttarna och Flykten från Vadstället" ("The Black Riders and Flight To The Ford")
# "I Elronds Hus och Ringen Vandrar Söderut" ("At The House Of Elrond and The Ring Goes South")
# "En Vandring I Mörkret" ("A Journey In The Dark")
# "Lothlorien"
# "Skuggfaxe" ("Shadowfax")
# "Rohans Horn och Slaget på Pelennors Slätter" ("The Horns Of Rohan and The Battle Of Pelennor Fields")
# "Drömmar I Läkandets Hus" ("Dreams In The House Of Healing")
# "Hemfärden och Fylke Rensas" ("Homeward Bound and The Scouring Of The Shire")
# "De Grå Hamnarna" ("The Gray Havens")

==Line-up==
* Bo Hansson - organs, guitar, moog, bass
* Rune Carlsson - drums, congas
* Gunnar Bergsten - saxophone
* Sten Bergman - flute
